name: Flat Earth (Rinogg)
description:
First GameJam ever! WOOHOO!

Submission for Holistic 3D Lockdown GameJam on 27/04/2020. The theme was 'Conspiracy Theory' and thus we delivered. The game is a very simple-survive-as-much-as-you-can space shooter with 8-bit sounds and graphics to tickle the nostalgia in you.

A, D - Move

Space - Shoot

Dodge red lasers, save earth from blue 5G radiation.

How long can you survive the evil 5G satellites and the invading reptilians? Earth. Is. Flat.
